roleset.name: to formulate again

example.name: reformulate-v: passive
example.text: But [the plan]-3 now is being `` reformulated [*-3], '' Delmed said [] , [*-4] declining [*-2] to provide most of the new terms of the combination .

example.name: reformulation-n
example.text: Other theories included the pangenesis of Charles Darwin -LRB- which had both acquired and inherited aspects -RRB- and Francis Galton 's reformulation of pangenesis as both particulate and inherited .

roleset.note: REFORMULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reformulate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from reformulate.01-v predicate notes)
